alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 1:35PM EDT until May 22 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 135 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cuthbert to near Leary, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morgan, Dawson, Cuthbert, Edison, Arlington, Shellman, Leary, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Iveys Mill, Carnegie, Holt, Randolph Co A/p, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Aycock Mill, Chambliss, Olivers Mill and Martins Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
